tool_description: Retrieves and filters billing history, transaction records, and payment information for user accounts.

account_id.description: Account identifier for billing history retrieval

transaction_types.description: Filter by transaction types: charge, refund, credit, adjustment

limit.description: Maximum number of records to retrieve (1-1000)

error_messages: Account not found: The specified account_id does not exist.
Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date.
Invalid transaction type: Use valid types [charge, refund, credit, adjustment].
Invalid limit: Limit must be between 1 and 1000.
No billing history: No billing records found for the specified criteria.
usage: Provide account_id to retrieve billing history. Optionally filter by date range, transaction types, and set result limits.

total_charged.description: Total amount charged in the period
